sn22.117:1.2: “Idha, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi …pe… sappurisadhamme avinito
sn22.117:1.3: rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam; attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
sn22.117:1.4: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano rupabandhanabaddho santarabahirabandhanabaddho atiradassi aparadassi, baddho jiyati baddho miyati baddho asma loka param lokam gacchati.
sn22.117:1.5: Vedanam attato samanupassati …pe… vedanaya va attanam.
sn22.117:1.6: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano vedanabandhanabaddho santarabahirabandhanabaddho atiradassi aparadassi, baddho jiyati baddho miyati baddho asma loka param lokam gacchati.
sn22.117:1.10: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano vinnanabandhanabaddho santarabahirabandhanabaddho atiradassi aparadassi, baddho jiyati baddho miyati baddho asma loka param lokam gacchati.
sn22.117:2.1: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ariyanam dassavi …pe… sappurisadhamme suvinito
sn22.117:2.2: na rupam attato samanupassati, na rupavantam va attanam; na attani va rupam, na rupasmim va attanam.
sn22.117:2.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako na rupabandhanabaddho, na santarabahirabandhanabaddho, tiradassi, paradassi; ‘parimutto so dukkhasma’ti vadami.
sn22.117:2.8: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako na vinnanabandhanabaddho, na santarabahirabandhanabaddho, tiradassi, paradassi, ‘parimutto so dukkhasma’ti vadami”ti.
